item.title: Why bitcoin could easily hit $225,000 by 2026: Analyst

item.description: Bluesky, the Twitter/X alternative, is growing fast but also running into the same content moderation problems of its predecessor.

item.title: OpenAI Sora leak: What it was and what it wasnâ€™t.
item.description: Early testers for OpenAI's Sora made the AI video generator publicly available on Tuesday before it was shut down. But we still know next to nothing about the model and the early testing program.

item.title: Spotify Wrapped 2024 date: When it comes out, how to view yours
item.description: Spotify users eagerly await their Wrapped every year. Here's what you need to know about the date it drops and how to view yours.
